name: Drakewarden
description: Drakewardens form a powerful bond with draconic spirits that manifest as drakes. As they grow in power, their drakes evolve from small companions to majestic, rideable dragons, granting the ranger dragon-like abilities.

drakewarden_origin.description: The origin of your bond with the draconic spirit can be chosen from the following examples.

options.1: You studied a dragon’s scale or claw, or a trinket from a dragon’s hoard, creating your bond through that token’s lingering draconic magic.
options.2: A secret order of rangers who collect and guard draconic lore taught you their ways.
options.3: A dragon gave you a geode or gemstone to care for. To your surprise, the drake hatched from that stone.
options.4: You ingested a few drops of dragon blood, forever infusing your nature magic with draconic power.
options.5: An ancient Draconic inscription on a standing stone empowered you when you read it aloud.
options.6: You had a vivid dream of a mysterious figure accompanied by seven yellow canaries, who warned you of impending doom. When you awoke, your drake was there, watching you.

draconic_gift.description: At 3rd level, the bond with your drake grants you additional benefits.

details.tongue_of_dragons: You can speak, read, and write Draconic or one other language of your choice.

drake_companion.description: At 3rd level, you summon a drake bound to you. It fights alongside you and grows in power with you.

details.summoning: You summon the drake to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. You can choose its Draconic Essence damage type and its cosmetic characteristics.
details.actions: The drake shares your initiative count but acts immediately after you. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but only takes the Dodge action unless you use a bonus action to command it.

drake_stats.saving_throws: Dex +1 plus PB, Wis +2 plus PB
drake_stats.damage_immunities: Determined by the drake’s Draconic Essence trait

actions.bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 plus PB piercing damage.

reactions.infused_strikes: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake hits a target with a weapon attack, the drake causes the target to take an extra 1d6 damage of the type determined by its Draconic Essence.

bond_of_fang_and_scale.description: At 7th level, your bond with your drake strengthens, granting additional features.

details.drake_mount: The drake grows to Medium size and can be used as a mount if you are Medium or smaller. It cannot use its flying speed while you are riding it.
details.magic_fang: The drake’s Bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage of the chosen Draconic Essence type.
details.resistance: You gain resistance to the damage type chosen for the drake’s Draconic Essence.

drakes_breath.description: At 11th level, you or your drake can exhale a cone of damaging breath.

details.damage: Choose a damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison). Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. This damage increases to 10d6 at 15th level.
details.usage: Can’t be used again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 3rd-level or higher spell slot.

perfected_bond.description: At 15th level, your bond with your drake is perfected, enhancing your connection and the drake’s abilities.

details.empowered_bite: The drake’s Bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage of the chosen Draconic Essence type (total of 2d6 extra damage).
details.large_drake: The drake grows to Large size and can use its flying speed while you are riding it.
details.reflexive_resistance: When you or the drake takes damage within 30 feet of each other, you can use your reaction to grant resistance to that damage. This can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are regained after a long rest.
